creator: apila@sengent.com
text:
Check out the URL above.  I did not see anything mentioned about it on your 
site.  If you can please let me know if there are any news about it or patches 
for it?

Thank you,

Tony Pila
Sengent, Inc.

It is not, strictly speaking, an apache bug.  It is a bug in openssl.
If you don't run ssl you are not vulnerable.  If you run ssl, you
should upgrade to the latest openssl to fix the problem.
b
creator: slive@apache.org
